channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 3 ways to invest in what could become a $200 billion market for humanoid robots
item.description: Analysts see investment opportunities in makers of components, defense technology and critical minerals that will be vital to the future of robotics.

item.title: Businesses across the U.S. are beginning to pass tariff costs to consumers, Fed’s ‘beige book’ finds
item.description: Only two of a dozen Fed districts reported slight price growth. The rest saw higher costs.

item.title: Microsoft’s stock may be an AI winner — but it’s not acting like one
item.description: Morgan Stanley says the stock looks “well underpriced” in part due to heavy corporate enthusiasm for the company’s AI offerings.

item.title: The financial elite aren’t worried about a stock-market bubble yet — but you can’t afford to be so complacent
item.description: Investors know bull markets end, of course. But even the global leaders descending on Davos may underestimate the dangers.

item.title: Saks files for bankruptcy. These big fashion brands — and tech names — are waiting to get paid.
item.description: The Chapter 11 filing announced on Wednesday for the iconic, century-plus-old retailer — which oversees Saks Fifth Avenue, Neiman Marcus, Bergdorf Goo...

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trump’s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.
